item.title: Release XSpec v2.0.7
item.description: Release XSpec v2.0.7 Release v2.0.7 introduces new features and enhancements, fixes bugs, and improves the test suite and the documentation. These are the highlights for XSpec v2.0.7: Common to Languages Under Test x:helper lets you integrate your own test helpers @as can be set in x:context and x:expect XSLT You can test XSLT packages and static parameters (experimental) Schematron Compatible with SchXslt (not thoroughly tested) You can write advanced expressions in @location (e.
